info.name: TweetDeck Cyberpunk Neon
info.description: WARNING: Userstyles no longer supported. Please install via GreasyFork Cyberpunk Neon color scheme is a cyberpunk/outrun color scheme based on the Cyberpunk Neon Color Palette. Want more of it? Check out the Cyberpunk Neon GitHub If you like my work you can buy me a ko-fi or support me on liberapay.
